Gobi Manchurian

Fried cauliflower dish

Ingredients

  • 250 grams cauliflower florets
  • 1/2 cup flour
  • 1/4 cup cornstarch
  • 1 teaspoon red chili powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 cup water
  • 1 tablespoon garlic
  • 1/3 cup onions
  • 1/4 cup bell pepper
  • 1 tablespoon soy sauce
  • 1/2 rice vinegar

Preparation

  1. Bread caulifower florets and set aside
  2. Add oil to the pan
  3. When oil is hot, add small amounts of batter to florets and drop in oil
  4. After they are golden brown drain them with a tissue
  5. Mix chili powder and water to a paste
  6. Heat 1/2 teaspoon oil to another pan
  7. Add ginger garlic paste and saute
  8. Add soy sauce, red chili sauce, and paste and rice vinegar
  9. Cook on medium heat until sauce thickens
  10. Add in fried cauliflower and stir until combined
  11. Enjoy!
